title: Damaged Device
faults: The device is connected in series or parallel to an electric circuit.
solution_one: Connect the device properly by connecting the positive probe of ammeter to the positive terminal and the negative probe to one end of a resistor.

title: Frictional Error
solution_one: This can be minimized by tapping gently on the case with fingertip before taking an observation

title: Temperature Error
faults: resistance coil connected internally to the instrument by operating current
solution_one: Ventilation and cooling procedures should be arranged for the device

title: Observational error
faults: Misreading of parallax in reading and errors in estimation
solution_one: Providing a mirror beneath the scale
